[Generic]

Prerequisites Tier 1 with the Vigilant Seal

Cost 4 Fame

Effect It doesn't matter how powerful your weapons are if you don't know where to strike. Before an adventure, you take time to study a certain category of creatures, making it easier to recall their capabilities later. When you purchase this boon, either select one creature type from List 1 below, or choose two creature types from List 2. While this boon is slotted, you have a +1 circumstance bonus to Recall Knowledge about creatures of the selected type(s). If your Reputation Tier for the Vigilant Seal faction is 4, this bonus increases to +2.

List 1

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Aberration};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Animal};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Beast (nature)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Beast (arcana)};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Construct (arcana)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Construct (crafting)};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Dragon};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Elemental (arcana)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Elemental (nature)};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Fiend} or
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Undead}.

List 2

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Astral};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Celestial};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Ethereal};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Fey};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Fungus};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Giant};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Monitor};
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Ooze} or
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Recall Knowledge]{Plant}.
